text: Bascote is a hamlet in rural Warwickshire, England. Population details can be found under Long Itchington. The nearest town is Southam, 1.5 miles away. Bascote consists of a small number of large houses, a post box and a telephone box. Nearby is Bascote Heath home to a few country mansions, facility, several country cottages, farms, a war memorial, and the Fox and Hen public house. ==Environmental issues== The planned HS2 rail line will be under the Bascote Woods. Also there is a planned solar farm. ==External links== Category:Villages in Warwickshire
title: Bascote
